root.sql: create or replace view v_ass_depre_acc as select '02' ass_naturs,GROUP_ID, HOS_ID, COPY_CODE, DEPRE_NO, DEPRE_YEAR, DEPRE_MONTH, ASS_CARD_NO, SOURCE_ID, USE_DEPT_ID, USE_DEPT_NO, USE_PERCENT, PRIM_MONEY, NOW_DEPRE_AMOUNT, ADD_DEPRE_AMOUNT, ADD_DEPRE_MONTH, CUR_MONEY, FORE_MONEY, OPERATOR, DEAL_DATE, EQUI_DEPRE_CODE, NOTE from ASS_DEPRE_ACC_SPECIAL union all select '03' ass_naturs,GROUP_ID, HOS_ID, COPY_CODE, DEPRE_NO, DEPRE_YEAR, DEPRE_MONTH, ASS_CARD_NO, SOURCE_ID, USE_DEPT_ID, USE_DEPT_NO, USE_PERCENT, PRIM_MONEY, NOW_DEPRE_AMOUNT, ADD_DEPRE_AMOUNT, ADD_DEPRE_MONTH, CUR_MONEY, FORE_MONEY, OPERATOR, DEAL_DATE, EQUI_DEPRE_CODE, NOTE from ASS_DEPRE_ACC_GENERAL t union all select '01' ass_naturs,GROUP_ID, HOS_ID, COPY_CODE, DEPRE_NO, DEPRE_YEAR, DEPRE_MONTH, ASS_CARD_NO, SOURCE_ID, USE_DEPT_ID, USE_DEPT_NO, USE_PERCENT, PRIM_MONEY, NOW_DEPRE_AMOUNT, ADD_DEPRE_AMOUNT, ADD_DEPRE_MONTH, CUR_MONEY, FORE_MONEY, OPERATOR, DEAL_DATE, EQUI_DEPRE_CODE, NOTE from ASS_DEPRE_ACC_HOUSE t union all select '04' ass_naturs,GROUP_ID, HOS_ID, COPY_CODE, DEPRE_NO, DEPRE_YEAR, DEPRE_MONTH, ASS_CARD_NO, SOURCE_ID, USE_DEPT_ID, USE_DEPT_NO, USE_PERCENT, PRIM_MONEY, NOW_DEPRE_AMOUNT, ADD_DEPRE_AMOUNT, ADD_DEPRE_MONTH, CUR_MONEY, FORE_MONEY, OPERATOR, DEAL_DATE, EQUI_DEPRE_CODE, NOTE from ASS_DEPRE_ACC_OTHER t union all select '05' ass_naturs,GROUP_ID, HOS_ID, COPY_CODE, DEPRE_NO, DEPRE_YEAR, DEPRE_MONTH, ASS_CARD_NO, SOURCE_ID, USE_DEPT_ID, USE_DEPT_NO, USE_PERCENT, PRIM_MONEY, NOW_DEPRE_AMOUNT, ADD_DEPRE_AMOUNT, ADD_DEPRE_MONTH, CUR_MONEY, FORE_MONEY, OPERATOR, DEAL_DATE, EQUI_DEPRE_CODE, NOTE from ASS_DEPRE_ACC_INASSETS t union all select '06' ass_naturs,GROUP_ID, HOS_ID, COPY_CODE, DEPRE_NO, DEPRE_YEAR, DEPRE_MONTH, ASS_CARD_NO, SOURCE_ID, USE_DEPT_ID, USE_DEPT_NO, USE_PERCENT, PRIM_MONEY, NOW_DEPRE_AMOUNT, ADD_DEPRE_AMOUNT, ADD_DEPRE_MONTH, CUR_MONEY, FORE_MONEY, OPERATOR, DEAL_DATE, EQUI_DEPRE_CODE, NOTE from ASS_DEPRE_ACC_LAND t
